snippet: Marcos Ambrose passed Brad Keselowski on the final lap, then held him off in a fender-banging duel Sunday to win the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Watkins Glen International for the second straight time.
abstract: Marcos Ambrose passes Brad Keselowski on the final lap to win the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Watkins Glen International for the second straight time.
lead_paragraph: Marcos Ambrose passed Brad Keselowski on the final lap, then held him off in a fender-banging duel Sunday to win the Nascar Sprint Cup race at Watkins Glen International for the second straight time.

headline.seo: Marcos Ambrose Tops Brad Keselowski at Watkins Glen
headline.main: Ambrose Tops Keselowski in Duel at Watkins Glen
headline.print_headline: Ambrose Tops Keselowski In Duel at Watkins Glen
